updateElements.mainContentHeader: Your device will restart during this update
updateElements.mainContentSubHeader: Updates can take around 20-40 minutes to complete.
updateElements.mainContentText:
A fully up-to-date device is required to ensure the security of Figma's data.

Please update your macOS device within the allocated *Days Remaining To Update* found in the left column of this window.
To begin the update, simply click on the *Open Software Update* button and follow the prompts. Although it is recommended you are not required to update the OS to macOS Sonoma, simply scroll down within Software Update to *Other Updates Available* and install from there.

For more information, hit *More Info About Updates At Figma* in the bottom left corner of this window.
updateElements.mainHeader: Your device requires a macOS Security Update
